module.name: Digium Phones Config
module.changelog: *2.11.1.1* Add pin=voicemail support *2.11.1.0* Relocate firmware directory *2.11.0.10* Use abstracted function *2.11.0.9* Improve error reporting of firmware download *2.11.0.8* When reloading, we explicitly skip astman *2.11.0.7* Retrieve_conf speed improvements *2.11.0.6* Recover from missing firmware directory *2.11.0.5* Fixes for Custom Apps, External Line Edit, Download and select firmware, Queue Members, Status Entries *2.11.0.4* Fixed general settings save, dragdrop pb and net *2.11.0.3* Fixed Not Saving Data #6747 *2.11.0.1* FreePBX/Schmoozecom Release *2.10.0.9.3* Styling *0.1* initial commit
